intro: Cleistanthus libericus, commonly known as the African starwood, is a small to medium-sized evergreen tree native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is characterized by its smooth, greyish bark and elliptical,革质 (leathery) leaves. The plant produces small, greenish-yellow flowers that are clustered in dense, spherical inflorescences, and its fruit is a capsule containing numerous seeds. Cleistanthus libericus is often found in moist, well-drained soils in lowland and hill forest areas.
